item.title: State Of The Art Text Summarisation Techniques
item.description: State of the Art Summarisation Techniques Generating Headlines as Short Summaries of Text Information Systems Seminar 19/20 Anna Franziska Bothe Alex Truesdale Lukas Kolbe Abstract This project combines two NLP use cases: generation of text summaries (in the form of short news headlines) and classification of a given article as containing or not containing political / economic uncertainty. The two approaches are joined by generating a set of new headlines alternative to the original headlines for each article in the given article set.
